text: "Cold as Ice" is a 1977 pop rock song. The song is from music group Foreigner. The lyrics for the song speak of a man accusing a woman of spoiling an intimate relationship. The song peaked at #6 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100. American rapper Kanye West used a sample for his song "Cold". Rapper B.o.B sampled the chorus of the song for his song "Cold as Ice" in 2010. A cover version was heard during a commercial for Wendy's in Super Bowl LI in 2017. ==References== Category:Rock songs Category:Pop songs Category:1977 songs Category:Foreigner (band) songs
